title: Do you believe that there is a cabal of (non-politician) celebrities aiming to destroy western society?

body: Nah, I think they've been put on a pedastle for so long that they believe they are superior to other humans. They believe that any little thought or ideology they create is now fact and righteous. They're just being silly humans with massive power and no one to say "hey, maybe don't."

body: Yes, they've sold out for money or perhaps they've been blacked mailed by Epstein and those connected to him. Remember when Ricky Gervais said to Hollywood "I know he's all your friend"? The elites have secured their position, the normies worship them as kings and queens and gods and goddesses. They don't just want a plain nationalistic socialist or communism government, they are promoting a global citizenship technocracy with a socialist or communism government. The UN and the World Economic Form, Davos, The Bilderberg Meetings, The Tri-lateral Commission, the Old Aristrocracy, Deep Religion, and the Occult Secret Societies are all working to pull the levers of power. It's amusing for them. They have money, now it's power and control and preventing the little people from removing that from them. They see us as too stupid too rule ourselves, they are the "enlightened few" who are to decide. Meanwhile they are sick pedophiles drunk on hedonistic pleasure. But they do some charity too, so haha they still think of themselves as justified. They don't necessarily care about good or evil, in their world, under Luciferianism, it's just: Do As You Wish. They liken themselves to gods. And they are trying to achieve that, worshipped by followers and on stages, honored for 'intellect' and beauty. They use technology to monitor their sheep, shape their perception of the world, and discipline those who step out of line. They desire to rule the world, and they may very well achieve that in full‚Äîcontrolling the banks, resources, land, technology, media, and governments. They really already mostly do‚Äîjust quietly. They have gotten much more bold though, as no one sees nor cares (except those that are waking up). They love laughing at us. They tell the future, they tell the evil they do in the dark in their movies, music, and advertisements. They love symbolism, once you can read it, there's no going back.

body:
> They see us as too stupid too rule ourselves, they are the "enlightened few" who are to decide.
That is what I was going to write.
My opinion on this comes from working at universities.  The people with advanced degrees sincerely believe their credential makes them smarter than the masses in everything.

The other motivator is that they want a 'neat, orderly, efficient' society.  Free people are generally messy, uncoordinated, and wasteful.  But that's how creativity and improvement comes about.
body_html:
They see us as too stupid too rule ourselves, they are the "enlightened few" who are to decide. That is what I was going to write. My opinion on this comes from working at universities. The people with advanced degrees sincerely believe their credential makes them smarter than the masses in everything.

The other motivator is that they want a 'neat, orderly, efficient' society. Free people are generally messy, uncoordinated, and wasteful. But that's how creativity and improvement comes about.

They have gotten much more bold though, as no one sees nor cares (except those that are waking up). They love laughing at us. They tell the future, they tell the evil they do in the dark in their movies, music, and advertisements. They love symbolism, once you can read it, there's no going back.

body: Some of them certainly are. There is a hierarchy though. In the music business some of the agents have more control than the artists. There is a reason why there is a concept of "selling out" and "selling your soul to the devil." The C_A and the Tavistock Institute is involved with the messaging in music as well. All the big award shows are like rituals to them and symbolic of what is happening behind the scenes in the industry. Monarch programming is another aspect as well. They get them young and vulnerable.

body:
There are some missing dots from "Epstein" to "destroy Western society".
Celebrities are self-centred, entitled, hypocritical, etc., sure.
Celebrities rape kids because of that, makes sense.
Celebrities are plotting to destroy Western society? Ain't nobody got time for that.
